title: Convert Kilometers per Hour to Meters per Second
description: This function converts a speed value from kilometers per hour (km/h) to meters per second (m/s). It takes a real number input representing speed in km/h and returns the equivalent speed in m/s.
name: KMH_TO_MS

input.name: kmh
input.description: The speed value in kilometers per hour to be converted.

return_value.description: The equivalent speed value in meters per second after conversion.
